decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to disrupt and control the opponent's game plan using a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and disruptive creatures. By utilizing cards like Counterspell, Fatal Push, Thoughtseize, and Force of Negation, the deck aims to prevent the opponent from executing their strategy effectively. Additionally, cards like Murktide Regent and Abhorrent Oculus provide threats of their own while continuing the control theme. The deck's mana base is optimized with various fetch lands and dual lands to ensure consistency in casting spells.

This deck aims to apply early pressure on the opponent's resources while disrupting their game plan with cards like Skyclave Apparition and Solitude. By utilizing Aether Vial and Ephemerate, the deck can repeatedly bring back powerful creatures like Recruiter of the Guard and Flickerwisp to maintain board presence. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Fatal Push and Witch Enchanter to control the game. With a mix of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells, this Death and Taxes deck seeks to control the game tempo and overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize.

The main concept of this Aggro - Affinity deck is to utilize artifacts and efficient mana sources to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a flurry of threats. By combining aggressive creatures like Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Kappa Cannoneer with powerful artifacts like Mox Opal and Mishra's Bauble, the deck aims to establish early board presence and maintain pressure throughout the game. Additionally, cards like Metallic Rebuke and Force of Negation provide protection and disruption against opposing strategies, while cards like Urza's Saga and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provide additional card advantage and utility.
